mapper.select:
SELECT epo.despatch_batch as 'despatchBatch',ecqo.profession_name as 'professionName',epos.contract_code as 'contractCode',epos.purchase_req_order_code as 'purchaseReqOrderCode', bm.material_code as 'materialCode',eposd.location_num as 'locationNum',bm.material_name as 'materialName',eposd.spec as 'spec',eposd.dominant_term_code as 'dominantTermCode', eposd.device_code as 'deviceCode',eposd.putaway_qty as 'putawayQty',eposd.unit_name as 'unitName',ecqo.material_purpose as 'materialPurpose',bs.supplier_name as 'supplierName' From eng_packing_order_summary_det eposd LEFT JOIN eng_packing_order_summary epos ON eposd.packing_order_summary_id = epos.packing_order_summary_id LEFT JOIN eng_packing_order epo ON epos.packing_order_id = epo.packing_order_id LEFT JOIN base_material bm ON eposd.material_id = bm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_supplier bs ON epo.supplier_id = bs.supplier_id LEFT JOIN eng_contract_qty_order ecqo ON ecqo.contract_code = epos.contract_code AND bm.material_code = ecqo.material_code
eposd.putaway_qty>0
and eposd.org_id = #{orgId}
and epo.despatch_batch like CONCAT('%',#{despatchBatch},'%')
and ecqo.profession_name like CONCAT('%',#{professionName},'%')
and epos.contract_code like CONCAT('%',#{contractCode},'%')
and epos.purchase_req_order_code like CONCAT('%',#{purchaseReqOrderCode},'%')
and bm.material_code like CONCAT('%',#{materialCode},'%')
and eposd.location_num like CONCAT('%',#{locationNum},'%')
and bm.material_name like CONCAT('%',#{materialName},'%')
and eposd.spec like CONCAT('%',#{spec},'%')
and eposd.dominant_term_code like CONCAT('%',#{dominantTermCode},'%')
and eposd.device_code like CONCAT('%',#{deviceCode},'%')
and eposd.putaway_qty =#{putawayQty}
and eposd.unit_name like CONCAT('%',#{unitName},'%')
and ecqo.material_purpose like CONCAT('%',#{materialPurpose},'%')
and bs.supplier_name like CONCAT('%',#{supplierName},'%')
ORDER BY epo.create_time DESC
